quiz.question: What is a startup "accelerator" program?
options: Short program offering mentorship, capital, and networking
quiz.answer: Short program offering mentorship, capital, and networking

quiz.question: What is the difference between pre-money and post-money valuation?
options: Pre-money is valuation before new investment; post-money includes that investment
Pre-money includes new cash; post-money excludes cash
quiz.answer: Pre-money is valuation before new investment; post-money includes that investment

quiz.question: Which public-market approach lets existing private shareholders sell shares without a traditional IPO roadshow?
What is a "seed" round in startup funding?
options: Initial funding to build product and proof of concept
quiz.answer: Initial funding to build product and proof of concept

quiz.question: What metric pairs customer lifetime value with acquisition cost for unit economics?
Which advanced anti-dilution provision adjusts investor price protection by weighted-average or full-ratchet methods?
What is a "founder" in the context of startups?
options: Person who launches and builds the initial company
Someone who funds a large corporation
An employee hired after Series A
quiz.answer: Person who launches and builds the initial company

quiz.question: Which metric measures monthly recurring revenue normalized for subscription businesses?
Which company famously scaled via aggressive subsidized pricing to capture market share in ride-hailing?
What does "burn rate" measure for a startup?
options: Monthly cash spent to run the business
Number of users acquired per month
Percentage of equity given to investors
quiz.answer: Monthly cash spent to run the business

quiz.question: Which marketplace unicorn popularized short-term private rentals globally?
Which unicorn built a developer platform and raised major private funding while staying private as of 2024?
Which startup famous for short videos launched globally under the name TikTok?
Which startup popularized the "network effects" concept by becoming more valuable as users increased?
Which provision protects early employees by scheduling equity vesting over time with a cliff period?
options: Standard four-year vesting with a one-year cliff
quiz.answer: Standard four-year vesting with a one-year cliff
